title: Teen Killed In Overnight Shooting
content:
Goldsboro Police are searching for more answers in a fatal shooting early Friday morning that left a teenager dead.
Officers arrived in the 400 Block of East Holly Street and found 17-year-old Montez Wilson wounded. When medical personnel arrived on the scene Wilson was pronounced dead.
The incident happened shortly after 2 a.m. The gunman is still on the run.
If you have information please call the Goldsboro Police Department or Goldsboro Wayne Crime Stoppers at 919-735-2255. You will remain anonymous and you may receive a cash reward up to $1,000 for your information.
